Name: Veteran's Visage
Title: Face of Glory: Veteran's Visage
Desc: "Yet even though the scars can be covered, the wounds laid on one's heart will not disappear."

Talent.Name: Veteran's Visage
Talent.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFFFF>After the character takes DMG or is healed:</color> Based on the number of times this effect has been triggered this Round, the effects will be different.
<color=#FFFFFFFF>First Trigger:</color> Create 1 Elemental Die of the character's Elemental Type.
<color=#FFFFFFFF>Second Trigger:</color> Draw 1 card.
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3004}Artifact)
